data.text: @allergicium @Zakari1Benamara @LeafsAllDayy @Jordan55372507 @MMAJunkie @felderpaul @RdosAnjosMMA Everyone is booked and Charles has beaten. Islam is the only person in the top 5 that isn’t booked. Who else would he fight ?

@LemickeyJames06 @Zakari1Benamara @LeafsAllDayy @Jordan55372507 @MMAJunkie @felderpaul @RdosAnjosMMA Nobody complain when oliveira & chandler got title shot. Olives beat old ferguson who just came out of loss & kevin lee who’s  basically the same as dan hooker. Chandler’s case was even worse

@burgerasscheeks @46scwbrian @SaudiHaramco @MMAJunkie @felderpaul @RdosAnjosMMA He literally said after the last one that hes not going anywhere, as in hes not retired, go watch his last post fight interview. And none of those are good reasons when the “young upcoming” guy wont take the fight, if paul is willing to do it take what you get.
